programme.title: Teddies 2
programme.desc: On 'Different Day', the teddies have fun dressing up and acting like someone else for the day. Dom pretends to be Sparky, Tizzy pretends to be Dom, Sparky pretends to be Meeks and Meeks pretends to be Tizzy. Later, when Tizzy discovers that they've run out of teddy treats, she gets the idea to make her very own red panda treats. However, her friends are a little skeptical about how the treats will taste when they learn that she's making them with vegetables.

programme.title: Pinkfong Songs & Stories
programme.desc: Enjoy the best of Pinkfong's most loved songs and stories with all your favourite characters!

programme.title: Sesame Street
programme.desc: Elmo's newly-adopted puppy Tango joins the show in a new recurring animated segment, "Elmo & Tango's Mysterious Mysteries"!

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: Thomas and his loc-amigos will embrace unexpected surprises and discover more about each other as they get into new shenanigans on the Island of Sodor. Whiff, Ashima, Toby, Terence, Salty and all new characters will join the fun.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends
programme.desc: The gang meet an oyster. The Imp steals its pearl. Ollie and Cherry have to set aside their strong opinions, and compromise to save the pearl. Ollie wins first prize at an art competition, and the fame is getting to his head and he leaves his friends to do all the work in creating a specially commissioned piece for the museum.

programme.title: Saving Me
programme.desc: A super genius billionaire goes back in time to teach his 11-year-old self to be a better person.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus
programme.desc: Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu are four young dinosaurs growing up in the Cretaceous period. Life is always an adventure: new volcanoes are popping up all the time, long-necked brachiosauruses and enormous triceratopses roam free, meteor showers light up the night sky and... the fierce Gigantosaurus reigns over it all!

programme.title: The Penguins Of Madagascar
programme.desc: The daily adventures of penguins living in New York's Central Park Zoo.

programme.title: The Adventures Of The Young Marco Polo - Journey To Madagascar
programme.desc: Marco Polo is about to return home to Venice when he discovers that his friend Shi La is not an orphan! To find her long-lost mother, Marco, Shi La, and Luigi set out on an adventurous journey across new countries!

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: On Halloween night, Madcap, Porcupunk and Orangutank dress up and come knocking on Axel's door, determined to play an evil prank on him! But nothing goes as planned...

programme.title: Transformers Earthspark
programme.desc: A new species of Transformers must find their place and purpose among Autobots, Decepticons, and the human family who adopts them.

programme.title: The Haunted House: Secret Of The Ghost Ball
programme.desc: There is something not quite right about Shinbi Apartment. Ever since siblings Hari and Doori moved in, they could tell right away that everything seemed a little off. Is it the look? Is it the feel? Is it the smell? Maybe it is the ghosts!

programme.title: 100 Wishes
programme.desc: A fresh twist on the Genie lore, 100 Wishes is a heartwarming comedy series in the style of LILO & STITCH and MONSTERS INC.

programme.title: On The Red Dot - Food Feud
programme.desc: Which is the Michelin-starred pork noodle stall: Tai Hwa or Tai Wah? Confused customers accidentally end up at the wrong stall prompting the owner of the starred stall to take action.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: Cheese is an ingredient in many dishes we eat these days. But do you know what's in your cheese? Steven Chia makes a startling discovery about some of our favourite types of cheese.

programme.title: Tanglin
programme.desc: Bhaskar finally had enough of Meera and tells her he wants a separation. Chris thinks he is in line to take over at Life Feed but ends up getting a rude shock. Ben's embarrassing accident at TCH gets caught on video and it goes viral.

programme.title: The Wonder Shop
programme.desc: Protects your mattress from dust mites and bed bugs with this Ultimate Bed Cover Mattress!

programme.title: The Wonder Shop
programme.desc: Discover how you can wake up every morning glowing and refreshed as our hosts prove how a comfortable pillow is key for a good night's sleep.

programme.title: Macao Gourmet
programme.desc: Justine meets with Chef Hans Lee Rasmussen who visited Justine to visit Macao Tourism Institute where he is training aspiring Chefs to fight food waste and make their industry more sustainable.

programme.title: Donal's Irish Adventure
programme.desc: Experience the Emerald Isle as you've never seen it before, as we join Donal and his faithful dog Max on a culinary road trip around Ireland, discovering the people, places and ingredients that make it magical. In each episode, Donal will be cooking up a local dish, from fresh lobster rolls on the dramatic coastline of West Cork to oyster shooters in Galway's picturesque oasis.

programme.title: Lingo UK
programme.desc: In this game show, hosted by the iconic RuPaul, the simplest of words could be worth thousands of dollars. Lingo is the fast paced word-play game that keeps on innovating for new audiences, with its mix of skill, tension, humour and the chance to win big cash prizes. Teams are pitted against each other in a battle to fill in the blanks and find words.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune
programme.desc: All new season of Wheel of Fortune.

programme.title: The Chase USA
programme.desc: Contestants compete against a professional quizzer, known as the Chaser, whose aim is to prevent the contestants from winning a cash prize. Hosted by Sara Haines.

programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: Nelly is upset with Heng when he makes plans to go for another business trip. Evelyn tries to strike a balance between being a friend and a parent to Sarah.

programme.title: News Tonight With Highlights From Parliament
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: 128 Circle
programme.desc: The police question the hawkers over the vandalism at Sha Sha Cha, and a prime suspect emerges. Meanwhile, an old gangster returns to haunt 128 Circle...

programme.title: Sullivan's Crossing
programme.desc: Maggie returns to Boston prepared to deal with the consequences of her professional actions. But a secret is revealed that causes her to question her life in the city. Returning to Sullivan's Crossing, Maggie is forced to face feelings of disappointment and rejection that ultimately lead her to confront Sully about her painful past and make a difficult choice.

programme.title: World Sailing Show
programme.desc: The World Sailing Show is the official international sailing series of the sailing federation World Sailing and is a monthly digest of everything that matters in the sport. From Olympic sailing to the round the world races and the America's Cup, the show includes personality profiles of the top players and technical features from the cutting edge of the sport where the access provided behind the scenes at major events is unparalleled.

programme.title: Whatever Will Be, Will Be
programme.desc: (R) Yingjin forces Nanshan to demand his share of the winnings. Dafu and Nanshan fall out over the money. Bishan is fired. He finds out Huiyao gambled his money away instead of lending it to her brother. Only Biran helps him when loan sharks come after him. At an event, everyone tries to set Biran up with Meiqi. Meiqi goes to St John's Island. Biran goes after her. They start dating.

programme.title: Morning Express
programme.desc: (Live) A daily brand new News belt, from Monday to Friday, 9am - 9.30am.

programme.title: Sisterhood
programme.desc: (R) Shixiang hints that Tianqing is not up to the task and forcefully volunteers to rebuild the house. Nan Lan has long seen through Shixiang's ambitions, deliberately sending Shixiang out to deal with Xueqiao.

programme.title: Inside OT
programme.desc: (R) Two elderly patients go under the knife at the National Heart Centre Singapore. One man gets an artificial aortic valve implant in a minimally invasive surgery, while the other has to undergo two surgeries; the first to remove a lung nodule and then another to remove a larger part of his lungs.

programme.title: Taste Of Life
programme.desc: (R) Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change...

programme.title: Whatever Will Be, Will Be

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW
programme.desc: With a keen eye for goal combined with electric pace, Gabriel Martinelli is helping steer Arsenal towards another title challenge. Martinelli sits down with The Big Interview to discuss his upbringing, harnessing his talent at Corinthians, leaving Brazil for Europe and what the future holds for Arsenal under Mikel Arteta.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW
programme.desc: Having played for 14 different clubs and with a new long-term contract recently secured at Luton Town, Andros Townsend shares his dietary secrets to sustaining a long career in this week's Big Interview. programme.title: Greatest Classics Marco Antonio Barrera vs. Agapito Sanchez
programme.desc: With the WBO Super Bantamweight World Championship on the line, titleholder Marco Antonio Barrera of Mexico takes on Dominican challenger Agapito Sanchez in front of a hot crowd at the Civic Center in South Padre Island, Texas. This would be the third defense for Barrera, who claimed the title with a decision victory over Daniel Jimenez earlier in the year. Sanchez was a worthy contender to the title, giving the 37-0 champion a much tougher challenge than he expected.

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Danny Garcia vs. Erik Morales
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is Danny Garcia looking to win the WBC super lightweight championship when he squares off with Erik Morales, but Garcia must battle back after suffering a nose injury early on. Also on the card, former world champions Hector Camacho and Adonis Stevenson.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 3 featuring Kotoyuki, Asanoyama, Aoiyama and Ryuden from the Kyushu basho, 2019.

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior
programme.desc: Competitors tackle ten obstacles in Baltimore, Maryland, including brand new obstacles like the Rumbling Dice and Body Prop. 30 athletes will have to prove themselves once again in order to earn a trip to Las Vegas. Find out if children's performer Jamie Rahn, also known as Captain NBC, has enough grip strength to get him through the course.

programme.title: FS MMA Ante Delija vs. Oli Thompson
programme.desc: In this episode of FIGHT SPORTS MMA, we take you to action from KSW in Zagreb, Croatia, when local heavyweight Ante Delija from Dubrovnik takes on Oli "The Spartan" Thompson of East Sussex, England. The massive Delija, standing 6'5" and nearly 240 lbs (108 kg) holds a spectacular 16-3 record with tremendous power. Thompson is a veteran with 20 wins in his MMA career, and can stand toe-to-toe with Delija in his home country.

programme.title: MEGA Fights In 60 Chad Dawson vs. Antonio Tarver II
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features Light Heavyweight 'Bad' Chad Dawson (27-0, 17 KOs) vs. Antonio 'Magic Man' Tarver (27-5, 19 KOs). Held at the Hard Rock Hotel and Casino, Las Vegas, Nevada, USA on May 9, 2009, it's Dawson's first defense of the IBF Light Heavyweight and IBO Light Heavyweight titles.

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS WCK Anass Aaras vs Andre Estevao
programme.desc: WCK features intense, nonstop battles in both freestyle kickboxing and Muay Thai from around the world. It's kickboxing's most talented athletes at their finest! This episode, from Eindhoven, the Netherlands, features main event Anass Aaras (Morocco) vs. Andre Estevao (Angola).

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Amir Khan vs. Danny Garcia
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a light welterweight title unification bout between Amir Khan and Danny Garcia. Also on the card, former heavyweight champ James Kirkland.

programme.title: FS Grand Sumo
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. programme.title: Judo for the World
programme.desc: Judo for the World features the best competitors in the sport as they compete in a global tour for an opportunity to vie for the gold in the World Judo Championship. In this episode we see the best of the Judo Grand Slam from Ekaterinburg, speak with number 1 ranked fighter Khasan Khalmurzaev about his return to Judo, and show Soichi Hashimoto's success using his signature throw.

programme.title: Prison Fighters
programme.desc: This series follows former Muay Thai champion Noy Khaopan and American Cody Moberly, two inmates in a Thailand prison, who after seven years are given the chance to fight for their release. By joining a controversial government modern day Prison Fight program, murderers and felons are given the chance to fight for their freedom, and possible redemption, through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches. Episode 2 of 4.

programme.title: Andy's Global Adventures

programme.desc: This drama revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the daily struggles, laughter and warmth that the different generations within the family experience!

programme.title: In Bed With A Stranger
programme.desc: Family members of a missing person may apply for the person to be declared legally dead after seven years. Yeung Man-sum decides to forget his wife Koo Ching-tin, who has been missing for seven years, and marry his girlfriend Chu Sin-mei, but Ching-tin astonishingly turns up!

programme.title: Happily Ever After?
programme.desc: Six characters - middle-aged nobody Poon Sin-yan; perfect wife Cheung Ming-sum; charming Kam Shing-kwan; gold digger Lui Ching-lam; hopeless romantic Lui Ching-hoi and kidult-cum-dating app player Ching Tin-fai - are depicted in a polyamorous relationship love story.

programme.title: Funny Funny Home
programme.desc: A group of friends who are knowledgeable about home affairs compete in this show that puts their life wisdom to the test.

programme.title: EXTRA
programme.desc: Keep up with the news on the entertainment circle in Hong Kong and all over the world, with reports on the latest drama series, movies, concert highlights, award ceremonies and more.

programme.title: News Roundup
programme.desc: A round-up of the news before the day ends.

programme.title: Global View

She then opens a private investigation agency and, due to all sorts of accidental mishaps, employs KUNG CHAK-LAM (Wong Cho Lam), KUNG TUK-LAM (Louis Yuen) and TSUI SHUI (Johnson Lee). The three young men have all been treated badly by life. By taking them in, TUNG is given the ability of clairvoyance, that is, the power to see the future.

programme.desc: CHOW CHI YU (Wu Myolie) once adopted a stray dog TAI PA but it brought virus to her father’s kennel and all the dogs inside are dead tragically. Since then, her older brother CHOW CHI JIM (Lui Fong) and sister-in-law SHUI TIN LAN (Tsang Wah Sin) have no choice but to open a pet shop for a living. Later, YU met TAI PA’s little brother SIU PA but her boyfriend YING HOI LEUNG (Wong Ho Yin) suggested her to keep it in an empty house nearby.

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: HUNG SHU-KAN (Lau Dan) built his own logistics business from scratch and now everything is in order. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, HUNG YUEK-SHUI (Koni Lui), is still single. She and her little prodigy sister, HUNG SUM-YUE (Andrea So), often fight over small things, putting their father in dilemmas.

programme.title: Family Link, The
programme.desc: Many people say that housewives are good-for-nothing and will only idle away their time on boring chores. But MUNG KA-KA (TANG SHUI MAN, SHEREN), TING MUI-HEUNG (YIP TUNG, CECILIA) and CHO MEI-NGO (SHEUNG TIN NGOR, KIKI) will prove them wrong. Contrary to what you might think, being a housewife is as stressful as fighting in the battlefield. The never-ending housework and the persistent family conflicts will put them on the alert at all times.

programme.title: Beauty And The Boss
programme.desc: Wong Lai-mei (Ali Lee) rejoins the workforce after playing the role of housewife for ten years after her marriage. She is employed by PR agency boss Mak Tsz-fung (Moses Chan). She then decides to get a divorce as she realizes she has misspent her youth on her husband. Tsz-fung, So Chak-kei (Raymond Cho), Tong Yan (Edwin Siu) and Choi See-ki (Harriet Yeung) are amicable partners.

programme.title: Awakening Story, The
programme.desc: LAM HO SHU (WANG MING CHUN, LIZA) had fallen into a coma after a traffic accident sixteen years ago. She wakes up suddenly. With support from her husband, KI (LAU CHUNG YAN, DAMIAN), her daughters, KA (CHEUNG HO YEE, MAGGIE) and YAN (YEUNG YI, TAVIA), her son, CHAI (TANG KIN WANG, PATRICK), and best friend, LAM (SO YUK WAH, LOUISA), she takes up the responsibility of being a mother and a wife again. Unfortunately, KI and LAM have already developed a relationship.

programme.title: Speed Of Life
programme.desc: The police inspector of the traffic unit, TO CHEUK-FUNG (Kenny Wong), takes it upon himself to crack down on illegal street racing and bring the criminals to justice, often driving a stealth car to patrol the highways for traffic enforcement along with his subordinates. CHEUK-FUNG appears to be an aloof man with a stern face, and none of his co-workers understand him except SZE MA (Benjamin Yuen) of the accident investigation unit.

programme.title: Speed Of Life
programme.desc: The police inspector of the traffic unit, TO CHEUK-FUNG (Kenny Wong), takes it upon himself to crack down on illegal street racing and bring the criminals to justice, often driving a stealth car to patrol the highways for traffic enforcement along with his subordinates. CHEUK-FUNG appears to be an aloof man with a stern face, and none of his co-workers understand him except SZE MA (Benjamin Yuen) of the accident investigation unit.

programme.title: Virtues of Harmony
programme.desc: A widow CHI (SIT KA YIN, NANCY) owns a popular restaurant, Honey Cave, in Resonance Town. She has triplets - two boys, NIN and YUE and a daughter, YAT. NIN used to be working as a government official in the capital, but he has offended a princess and has been demoted and sent back to his hometown.

programme.title: 36 Secrets of Courtship
programme.desc: This erotic comedy features three lotharios who vie to become principal of the Macho Man Training School -- an extremely sexy institution dedicated to extremely non Shaolin-types of physical exertion.

programme.title: Fat Choi Spirit
programme.desc: Andy is a mahjong master who is very popular in the neighbourhood. However, after being cursed by his ex-girlfriend, Andy always experiences bad luck when playing mahjong. Can he finally dodge this streak of bad luck?

programme.title: Everyday Is Valentine
programme.desc: OK is a serial liar who constantly bends the truth to get his way. One day, he meets his dream girl, Wonderful and pretends to be a rich man in order to win her heart. However, Wonderful has sworn that she will never love a man who lies. Can OK stop lying and win his dream girl's heart?

programme.title: Mighty Baby
programme.desc: Lena, Johnny and Wayne are tasked with developing the "Mighty B" line of baby products. Since the last successful launch of the "Mighty Bra", Johnny now heads the department while Lena and Wayne are planning their wedding. Wayne however, has "Baby-Phobia", and that throws a wrench into their work and relationship.

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Mun undergoes a cornea transplant to correct her blindness, but ends up gaining more than the gift of sight. She shockingly realises that she is seeing another woman instead of herself whenever she looks into a mirror. Recalling that things changed ever since her cornea was replaced, Mun vows to uncover the truth behind her strange vision...

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: Xiao Zhuang is a professional killer who accidentally blinds a young nightclub singer Jenny in a gunfire action. He must quickly raise a lot of money for Jenny's corneal transplantation but his action draws the attention of a detective who is investigating the case. Will Xiao Zhuang be arrested and can Jenny restore her sight?

programme.title: My Dream Girl
programme.desc: Tycoon Cheung is back in China after being abroad for five years and finds his long-lost daughter, Ling, in a poor village. To transform his unrefined and dirty daughter into a lady, Cheung hires Joe as Ling's image consultant.

programme.title: The Longest Nite
programme.desc: Two triad leaders, George and Kei, negotiate to join forces. As a bounty of $5 million is put on killing George, Kei assigns Sam, a corrupt cop who is also his right-hand man, to stop the killers. In the process, Sam meets a bald killer Tony, who stalks him and causes him troubles. When Sam realizes he is being set up, it was already too late...

programme.title: Loving You
programme.desc: A bad-tempered, womanizing cop who always neglects his wife is shot in the head as he hunts down a drug dealer. Though he miraculously survives, he must depend on his wife to nurse him back to health. During the recovery, he begins to re-evaluate his life and repair the damages of his broken marriage.

programme.title: Five Shaolin Masters
programme.desc: The Qing court plots to kill all Shaolin disciples by burning down Shaolin Temple. This sudden fire killed almost everyone except for five disciples. To take revenge on the Qing court, the five of them train hard in different fighting styles to become "The Five Shaolin Masters".

programme.title: A Friend from Inner Space
programme.desc: A young boy whose parents are separated tries to find happiness in life. One day, he meets and befriends a kind-hearted spirit Ren, who decides to make him truly happy by getting his parents back together.

programme.title: The Protectors
programme.desc: Ling Hsiao and Kuan Wang Lung are two guard chiefs working for an old convoy master. Lung is secretly in love with Fang Yen, the master's granddaughter but Yen is attracted to Ling Hsiao instead. In order to win her back, Lung sets up a trap to steal the convoy and frames Ling Hsiao for it.

programme.title: Carry on Doctors and Nurses
programme.desc: At St. Morant Hospital, a harried but lovely administrator must deal with lusty interns, student nurses, a delirious surgeon, a dissection fiend, a criticizing Commissioner and gross negligence at regular intervals! This comedy is based on the hugely successful British Carry On! film series.

programme.title: Descendant of the Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: Big Times for the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: Ah Niu finds a bag of jewels on the street and becomes rich. It is at this time that Uncle Zhou asks him to sign a contract to marry a girl, but it turns out to be a trap for Ah Niu to sell his house. In the end, Ah Niu becomes poor again...

programme.title: Heroes Shed No Tears
programme.desc: Kao Chien Fei is a young swordsman who wields a special sword with a teardrop marked on its blade. He is charged with averting an impending crisis in the martial arts world, but the villain, Zhou Tung Lai, wishes to become the ruler in the martial arts world, and launches a scheme to pit the various heroes against one another.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: The Bloody Escape
programme.desc: Ku is a skilled Kung Fu artist brought up by the bandits and does not agree with the brutal leader of the bandit's camp. He rescues Tong, a young lady forced to become the leader's wife, causing both the authorities and bandits to come after them. Ku has to stand up against the bandits that he grew up with so as to start a new life for himself.

programme.title: Discover New Taiwan Step By Step
programme.desc: The creative production team goes around Taiwan in search of inspiring stories in the country. Get to know more unique individuals and discover the true spirit of Taiwan.

programme.desc: Based on true events, the story revolves around an abusive husband and his wife. The movie delves into an investigation of how things escalated to this point and explores the character of a man who could commit such a heinous act by killing his own family.

programme.title: Artificial City

programme.desc: The story centers Feng Xiaoqin and Gu Qingyu, two sisters-in-law who work through their differences and grow closer in life. Faced with strong pursuit from Zhao Xiang and the reappearance of her childhood sweet heart Shi Yuan, Qingyu is entangled.

programme.title: Hot Door Night 26

programme.title: HSBC SVNS
programme.desc: World Rugby's revamped and rebranded global celebration of rugby sevens is taking place across eight iconic destinations and is set to supercharge the sport's global appeal, with 7 regular season events taking place before the Grand Final in Madrid.

programme.title: Trans World Sport
programme.desc: Trans World Sport is a weekly one-hour sports anthology programme, bringing you a collection of the latest news and features some of the most famous and amazing events in world sport.

programme.title: Isuzu UTE A-Lge /24 R19: Brisbane Roar FC vs Melbourne Victory
programme.desc: Melbourne City and Central Coast Mariners return as Premiers and Champions respectively heading into 2023-24 in the top-level professional men's football league in Australia and New Zealand. 12 teams are in the mix but there can only be 1 champion.

programme.title: cinch Premiership /24 Heart of Midlothian vs Celtic
programme.desc: The top division of the Scottish Professional Football League consists of 12 teams fighting for the title. The best of Scottish league football is epitomised by the world-renowned "Old Firm" rivalry between the 2 Glasgow teams: Celtic and Rangers.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night Rozenstruik vs Gaziev
programme.desc: The Ultimate Fighting Championship features some of the world's highest-profiled mixed martial arts exponents on its roster. The UFC Fight Night traditionally opens with a preliminary card and ends with the main card.

programme.title: Asian Le Mans Series /24 Highlights
programme.desc: Attracting some of the world's most successful endurance racing teams, as well as fostering new and emerging talent from the region, the Asian Le Mans Series is now a five-round Championship featuring races of four hours in length taking place in Sepang, the Dubai Autodrome and the Yas Marina Circuit.

programme.title: WWE SmackDown [PG - Violence]
programme.desc: [PG - Violence] This weekly live event programme brings you high-flying match-action, dazzling pyrotechnics and unpredictable drama from packed venues around the world. SmackDown, a term originally coined by The Rock, has earned its place as one of the most famous franchises in WWE history.

programme.title: The Football Review
programme.desc: Take a look back at the highlights and incidents that shaped the footballing world!

programme.title: AI Romantic
programme.desc: Koo Ka-lim is a salesman working for Singularity Limited, promoting his company's AI robots. One day, while Ka-lim is driving, he carelessly knocks down a dynamic AI robot that went astray while it is being shipped from the factory. Ka-lim decides to smuggle her into his home.

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: This drama revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the daily struggles, laughter and warmth that the different generations within the family experience!

programme.title: Hands Up
programme.desc: This children's programme encourages children to ask questions, express themselves, and move towards their goals!

programme.title: Another Me
programme.desc: Four artistes go to Taiwan to embark on a journey to search for "another me".

programme.title: Vital Lifeline
programme.desc: The body of the urban dweller is prone to problems. Vital Lifeline deconstructs your health. Each episode invites medical experts to explain the causes of various diseases, as well as physical therapists and sports therapists to teach appropriate exercises.

programme.title: In Bed With A Stranger
programme.desc: Family members of a missing person may apply for the person to be declared legally dead after seven years. Yeung Man-sum decides to forget his wife Koo Ching-tin, who has been missing for seven years, and marry his girlfriend Chu Sin-mei, but Ching-tin astonishingly turns up!

programme.title: Scoop

programme.title: When Love Comes Just In Time
programme.desc: Two Hong Kong male hosts invite Taiwanese girls with different personalities to spend a romantic 48 hours together! What kind of sparks will arise between two Hong Kong men and eight Taiwanese girls?

programme.desc: Big City Shop introduces viewers to the latest products on fashion, skin care, make-up, health care, baby care and much more! The hosts will demonstrate and try on the products, and also invite related experts to share their knowledge.

programme.title: Happily Ever After?
programme.desc: Six characters - middle-aged nobody Poon Sin-yan; perfect wife Cheung Ming-sum; charming Kam Shing-kwan; gold digger Lui Ching-lam; hopeless romantic Lui Ching-hoi and kidult-cum-dating app player Ching Tin-fai - are depicted in a polyamorous relationship love story.

programme.title: Another Me
programme.desc: Four artistes go to Taiwan to embark on a journey to search for "another me".

programme.desc: This children's programme encourages children to ask questions, express themselves, and move towards their goals!

programme.title: Dickies On Tour
programme.desc: These four hosts who became good brothers after participating in the drama series The Confidant, take a rare vacation to fly to Phuket, Thailand!

programme.title: Vital Lifeline
programme.desc: The body of the urban dweller is prone to problems. Vital Lifeline deconstructs your health. Each episode invites medical experts to explain the causes of various diseases, as well as physical therapists and sports therapists to teach appropriate exercises.

programme.title: Open Book
programme.desc: Each episode introduces a good book, from science to historical literature, from novels and even fashion, sharing the interesting knowledge gained from these books.

programme.title: Court Lady
programme.desc: A privileged son of one of the founding pillars of the Tang Empire and the daughter of a weaver fall in love. To continue their affair, they have to use their wits to navigate various palace intrigues.
